name: 闇に食べられた
description:
[NOT FINISHED]

It's late at night, mom asked you to turn the light off in living room. Get back safely before you eaten by the darkness!

Controls
Up Arrow / K       : move up
Down Arrow / J : move down
Left Arrow / H    : move up
Right Arrow / L  : move right
Space/Enter        : select menu
Space                      : place object (in create mode)
